incidents.name: SMS delivery delays to MTN Network in Swaziland (Eswatini)

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to MTN Network in Swaziland (Eswatini). Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to MTN Network in Nigeria

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate the issue causing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the MTN Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind Tre

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our carrier partner Wind Tre Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 July 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 13 July 2024 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind Tre Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

incident_updates.body:
Details: We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically removing a non-essential component from our system. This update is expected to be completed in less than a second and should not affect your service.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system’s performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately. Should a rollback be necessary, there may be a short downtime of approximately 2 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - TaskRouter

scheduled_maintenances.name: Authy and Verify V1 API - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: We’re conducting a planned Global maintenance between 15:00 to 15:30 Pacific Time on 08/03/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 3, 2024. Due to Authy API’s deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify V2 API. Verify V2 API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.

ACCOUNT SECURITY - Authy App
